project.script: on generateWebsite write the htmlText of bg fld "Overview" to file "/Users/uli/Programming/Stacksmith/docs/hammer/index.html" put the number of cards of stack "Stacksmith Help" into numCards repeat with x = 1 to the number of cards of stack "Stacksmith Help" go to card x of stack "Stacksmith Help" put bg fld "Title" into commandName put "/Users/uli/Programming/Stacksmith/docs/hammer/" & commandName & ".html" into filePath put "Generating page" && x && "of" && numCards && "at" && filePath write the long htmlText of bg fld "Description" to file filePath end repeat end generateWebsite
